description: This file defines the 'CourseDetailPage' React component, which displays detailed information about a course, including its title, description, instructor, modules, and provides actions like enrolling and starting the course. It interacts with external services and context to fetch data and trigger updates.

methods.name: CourseDetailPage()
methods.description: React functional component rendering course details, handling enroll/start actions, and displaying modules.

methods.name: handleEnroll
methods.description: Handles the course enrollment process, updates UI state, and calls external service.

methods.name: handleStart
methods.description: Handles starting the course, updates progress, and interacts with external service.
